metadata.synopsis: We walk in to find Zarys overseeing the torture of an agent that handed over special cargo to us. The agent is currently bound to a chair and badly beaten, and we're due to get the same treatment in her eyes - unless we can talk her out of it.Volume is likely louder than normal conversation but not shouting - she's standing on a raised platform perhaps ten feet above us and the tortured agent,

35.speaker: Zarys
35.text: You're the one who recruited me, Rugan.
35.context: CinematicNodeContext: For this entire exchange, Zarys is standing about ten feet above us on a raised platform.NodeContext: She's overseeing the torture of an agent of hers - one who originally recruited her to the organisation. Tone is chiding and also vaguely disgusted - he should have known better.

26.speaker: Zarys
26.text: You're the one who taught me rule number one, remember?
26.context: CinematicNodeContext: A shot of the torturer from behind, the moving aside to reveal Rugan.NodeContext: As if reflecting on 'good old days', but with a harder edge

37.speaker: Rugan
37.context: NodeContext: <Bound to a chair> Any moan / gurgle of pain or fear. He's been tortured for quite some time and is too exhausted to scream

53.speaker: Zarys
53.text: No. Olly didn't remember either, did you Olly?
53.context: NodeContext: Temporarily switching focus to a figure bound beside the tortured agent - he's the new recruit -  already dead from his wounds. but she's talking to him almost cheerfully.

2.text: You're dead the moment you steal from the Zhentarim.
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Close-up of Olly lying on the floor - already tortured to death,NodeContext: Olly is bound to a chair on the floor, tortued to death

57.speaker: Zarys
57.text: You're dead the moment you steal from the Zhentarim.
57.context: NodeContext: All joviality dropped - flat and icy-cold.

41.speaker: Zarys
41.context: NodeContext: Turning to us, making it clear the threat is intended for us also.

56.speaker: Player
56.text: *You recall an old Zhentarim proverb coined by their founder.*
56.context: NodeContext: Reassessing you - you've responded to the situation exactly as she would have.

23.speaker: Zarys
23.text: *You recall an old Zhentarim proverb coined by their founder.*
23.context: NodeContext: Reassessing you - you've responded to the situation exactly as she would have.

45.speaker: Narrator
45.text: *You recall an old Zhentarim proverb coined by their founder.*
45.context: NodeContext: Reassessing you - you've responded to the situation exactly as she would have.

12.speaker: Player
12.text: 'Steel ends enemies, but gold makes friends.'
12.context: NodeContext: Reassessing you - you've responded to the situation exactly as she would have.

25.speaker: Zarys
25.text: You've read Manshoon. Seems you know our ways better than poor Rugan here.
25.context: NodeContext: Reassessing you - you've responded to the situation exactly as she would have.

17.speaker: Zarys
17.text: There's not much money in retribution, true...
17.context: NodeContext: Considering - you've made a fair argument and she's leaning towards being merciful.

38.speaker: Zarys
38.text: Well, at least you've read Manshoon. Makes your 'emissary' lie a touch more tasteful.

15.text: Those explosives are sensitive - be a shame if something set them off.
15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Showing the explosives.NodeContext: A long pause while she sizes you up - you've just threatened to trigger explosives and kill everyone present, yourself included. She's impressed, and it's a threat she can't ignore.

46.speaker: Player
46.text: Those explosives are sensitive - be a shame if something set them off.
46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Showing the explosives.NodeContext: A long pause while she sizes you up - you've just threatened to trigger explosives and kill everyone present, yourself included. She's impressed, and it's a threat she can't ignore.

14.speaker: Zarys
14.text: ... you bloody wouldn't! Hah. You've got guts. I respect that.
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Showing the explosives.NodeContext: A long pause while she sizes you up - you've just threatened to trigger explosives and kill everyone present, yourself included. She's impressed, and it's a threat she can't ignore.

31.speaker: Zarys
31.text: Tell you what: you've already taken Rugan's cargo, so finish the job and I'll let you live. Deliver it to Baldur's Gate.
31.context: NodeContext: She's calculating - she was ready to kill you, but you've proven that you might actually be the person to finish an all important job for her.

39.speaker: Zarys
39.context: NodeContext: Off-hand, as if asking you to kill an unarmed man she's known for years is a mere formality.

58.speaker: Player
58.context: NodeContext: <Bound to a chair> Hysterical, panicking - he knows he's about to die but is begging nonetheless.

33.speaker: Rugan
33.text: Wait! WAIT! It was Olly, I SWEAR IT WAS OLLY!
33.context: NodeContext: <Bound to a chair> Hysterical, panicking - he knows he's about to die but is begging nonetheless.

10.speaker: Zarys
10.text: Show some respect, Rugan. The boy was loyal to you 'til the end.
10.context: NodeContext: As if disappointed in her former mentor - just wants this business over with.

13.speaker: Rugan
13.context: NodeContext: <Bound to a chair> Begging right up until the moment you kill him (dies at end of node, either stabbed or shot)

51.speaker: Zarys
51.text: And just like that, everyone profits.
51.context: NodeContext: Breezy, as if some simple matter has now been settled.

20.speaker: Zarys
20.text: All right then, recruit - you can stock up here and be on your way. Bring the cargo to Baldur's Gate. Someone there will make contact.
20.context: NodeContext: Taking on her military tone - she's your superior and she's giving you orders.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: Small problem - I don't actually have the cargo.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: The cargo's been opened. Not a problem, I hope?

21.speaker: Player
21.text: Profit's more important than vengeance. Let's make a deal.
21.context: NodeContext: Genuinely amused - you're trying to talk your way out of an impossible situation, and she respects that.

8.speaker: Zarys
8.text: Hah! The silver tongue on you. Usually I'd rip it out, but... well, these aren't normal times.
8.context: NodeContext: Genuinely amused - you're trying to talk your way out of an impossible situation, and she respects that.

55.speaker: Zarys
55.text: Hah! The silver tongue on you. Usually I'd rip it out, but... well, these aren't normal times.
55.context: NodeContext: Genuinely amused - you're trying to talk your way out of an impossible situation, and she respects that.

1.text: ... you were so close. So close to walking out of this alive.
1.context: NodeContext: Air of finality, but she says it as if it's a shame.

0.speaker: Zarys
0.text: ... you were so close. So close to walking out of this alive.
0.context: NodeContext: Air of finality, but she says it as if it's a shame.

54.speaker: Player
54.text: I've already shown I've got more wits than Rugan. Let's work together.
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and the character are metting their eyes.NodeContext: Genuine laughter - you're threatening her gang despite the odds being heavily stacked against you. She's won over by it.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: I'm going to walk out of here alive. Play it right, and so will you.
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and the character are metting their eyes.NodeContext: Genuine laughter - you're threatening her gang despite the odds being heavily stacked against you. She's won over by it.

16.speaker: Zarys
16.text: Hah - the fire in you! Maybe we wouldn't be here if Rugan had a little of that, eh?
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and the character are metting their eyes.NodeContext: Genuine laughter - you're threatening her gang despite the odds being heavily stacked against you. She's won over by it.

59.speaker: Zarys
59.text: Hah - the fire in you! Maybe we wouldn't be here if Rugan had a little of that, eh?
59.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and the character are metting their eyes.NodeContext: Genuine laughter - you're threatening her gang despite the odds being heavily stacked against you. She's won over by it.

52.text: Oof. I got a tingle for a second there.
52.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and the character are metting their eyes.NodeContext: Amused - player was  trying to sound fearsome, but it ultimately fell flat.

24.speaker: Zarys
24.text: Oof. I got a tingle for a second there.
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and the character are metting their eyes.NodeContext: Amused - player was  trying to sound fearsome, but it ultimately fell flat.

40.speaker: Player
40.text: Dead of boredom listening to you, pipsqueak.
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player spotted the explosives. Shot of explosives.InternalNodeContext: Showing the explosives.

32.speaker: Player
32.text: Profit's more important than vengeance. Let's make a deal.
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player spotted the explosives. Shot of explosives.InternalNodeContext: Showing the explosives.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: I've already shown I've got more wits than Rugan. Let's work together.
29.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player spotted the explosives. Shot of explosives.InternalNodeContext: Showing the explosives.

48.speaker: Player
48.text: I'm going to walk out of here alive. Play it right, and so will you.
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player spotted the explosives. Shot of explosives.InternalNodeContext: Showing the explosives.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: Look around for something you can use.
6.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player spotted the explosives. Shot of explosives.InternalNodeContext: Showing the explosives.

34.speaker: Narrator
34.text: *You spot explosives placed around the cavern. The Zhent are ready to bring the place down.*
34.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player spotted the explosives. Shot of explosives.InternalNodeContext: Showing the explosives.

36.speaker: Narrator
36.text: *You spot explosives placed around the cavern. The Zhent are ready to bring the place down.*
36.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player spotted the explosives. Shot of explosives.InternalNodeContext: Showing the explosives.

44.text: *You see nothing you can use. The mercenaries shift impatiently.*
44.context: NodeContext: As if vaguely surprised that you're not begging - but grimly pleased. She's run out of patience.

3.speaker: Narrator
3.text: *You see nothing you can use. The mercenaries shift impatiently.*
3.context: NodeContext: As if vaguely surprised that you're not begging - but grimly pleased. She's run out of patience.

49.speaker: Zarys
49.text: No final plea? Good - reckon I've heard enough of those today.
49.context: NodeContext: As if vaguely surprised that you're not begging - but grimly pleased. She's run out of patience.

11.speaker: Zarys
11.context: NodeContext: Barked order to the men behind her to take up their weapons.

43.speaker: Player
43.text: Can we just skip to the killing?
43.context: NodeContext: Genuinely amused - she likes your directness, and is all to happy to grant your request.

4.speaker: Zarys
4.text: Hah! Of course - all you had to do was ask.
4.context: NodeContext: Genuinely amused - she likes your directness, and is all to happy to grant your request.

42.speaker: Zarys
42.text: Which you should've known. That is, if you'd done your research before impersonating one of us.

30.speaker: Zarys
30.text: You're dead the moment you steal from the Zhentarim.
30.context: NodeContext: All joviality dropped - flat and icy-cold.
